original: MEINANDER, Carl Einar Natanael, Advo-ka, Ombudsman, Göteborg, f Björketorp, Älvsb l, 20/3 87 av lantbr Carl P M o Gerda Pettersson, gm Elsa Jakobsson. Jur kand 12, tingstjg 13—15, stud nat.ekon o fin.rätt Gbg 13, Sthlm 16—17. Aman o dir.ass Sv redarfrn 18—22, omb.m sed. 23 f Axel Broström & Son, ångf.AB Tirfing o Ferm, Sv orient linj, Sv Amer linj, Sv Amer Mex linj, Sv ostasiat komp, Götavkn, Eriksb mek verkst, Bostr linjeag, AB Bunkeroljor, red.AB :en Motorfart, Motortank 0 Gbg-Frederiksh linj, Hall ångb.AB, Gbgs bogs- & bärgn.AB, Nora bergsl jvgsAB mfl. Styr.led i fi sjöf.sammanslutn. Stdflm 27—34. Av trycket: Synpunkter ifr om reder:as be-skattn eft kriget. RVO.
translated: MEINANDER, Carl Einar Natanael, Attorney-at-law, Ombudsman, Gothenburg, born in Björketorp, Älvsborg County, on March 20th, 1887, son of farmer Carl P M and Gerda Pettersson, married to Elsa Jakobsson. Obtained a law degree in 1912, served as a court clerk from 1913 to 1915. Studied natural economics and financial law in Gothenburg from 1913, and in Stockholm from 1916 to 1917. Assistant and directorial assistant of Swedish shipping companies from 1918 to 1922, ombudsman since 1923 for Axel Broström & Son, AB Tirfing and Ferm steamship companies, Swedish Orient Line, Swedish American Line, Swedish American Mexican Line, Swedish East Asia Company, Götaverken, Eriksberg Mechanical Works, Boström Lineage Company, AB Bunker Oils, publisher of AB en Motorfart magazine, Motortank and Gothenburg-Frederikshavn Line, Hall Steamship Company, Gothenburg Towing and Salvage Company, Nora Bergslag Railway Company, among others. Served on the board of directors of several maritime associations. Member of the Royal Society in Stockholm from 1927 to 1934. Published opinions on the taxation of shipping companies after the war. Awarded the Order of the Vasa (RVO).
